customrecordcustomfield.description: Margin of profit as calculated by contribution costs per item.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Margin of profit as calculated by contribution costs per item.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Contribution Margin

customrecordcustomfield.description: Percentage of contribution margin as applied to base price (Sales)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Percentage of contribution margin as applied to base price (Sales)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Contribution Margin %

customrecordcustomfield.description: Link to default cost values to import thresholds and values for item cost specific calcuations.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Link to default cost values to import thresholds and values for item cost specific calcuations.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Item Cost Defaults

customrecordcustomfield.description: If the item is classified as a bulk item (bulk item field on item record is checked) then this box is checked for proper souring ad routing logic.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If the item is classified as a bulk item (bulk item field on item record is checked) then this box is checked for proper souring ad routing logic.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bulk Item

customrecordcustomfield.description: Item Shipping weight
customrecordcustomfield.help: Item Shipping weight
customrecordcustomfield.label: Weight

customrecordcustomfield.description: Dimensional Weight calculated as (L*W*H)/our rate number
customrecordcustomfield.help: Dimensional Weight calculated as (L*W*H)/our rate number
customrecordcustomfield.label: Dimensional Weight

customrecordcustomfield.description: Item Shipping Length
customrecordcustomfield.help: Item Shipping Length
customrecordcustomfield.label: Length

customrecordcustomfield.description: Item shipping width
customrecordcustomfield.help: Item shipping width
customrecordcustomfield.label: Width

customrecordcustomfield.description: Item Shipping Height
customrecordcustomfield.help: Item Shipping Height
customrecordcustomfield.label: Height

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated Value: Item Length + (2(Item Width) + 2*(Item Height))
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated Value: Item Length + (2(Item Width) + 2*(Item Height))
customrecordcustomfield.label: Length + Girth

customrecordcustomfield.description: Import the Maximum units that can ship on a single label from Item Record.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Import the Maximum units that can ship on a single label from Item Record.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Max Qty per Label

customrecordcustomfield.description: If Checked, the customer will be paying tariffs, so the value will set to zero for costing. Only applies to Bulk(Drop Ship) Orders.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If Checked, the customer will be paying tariffs, so the value will set to zero for costing. Only applies to Bulk(Drop Ship) Orders.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Customer Pays Tariff

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated total tariff cost for this item
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated total tariff cost for this item
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total Tariff

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows the Sea Freight charge by CBM multiplied by the item CBM.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows the Sea Freight charge by CBM multiplied by the item CBM.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total Sea Freight

customrecordcustomfield.description: If Checked, the customer will be paying the Sea Freight, so the value will set to zero for costing. Only applies to Bulk(Drop Ship) Orders.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If Checked, the customer will be paying the Sea Freight, so the value will set to zero for costing. Only applies to Bulk(Drop Ship) Orders.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Customer Pays Sea Freight

customrecordcustomfield.description: Link to Sea Freight custom record for ocean freight charges.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Link to Sea Freight custom record for ocean freight charges.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Sea Freight

customrecordcustomfield.description: Links to the Transfer Cost record for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Links to the Transfer Cost record for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Transfer Costs

customrecordcustomfield.description: Set the percentage of total units that get transferred after initial receipt (as opposed to remaining in the original warehouse)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Set the percentage of total units that get transferred after initial receipt (as opposed to remaining in the original warehouse)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Percent of Unit Transfers

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated by taking the total transfer costs by origin for the item type (FBM, FBA, Bulk) and multiplying by Percentage of Transfers.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated by taking the total transfer costs by origin for the item type (FBM, FBA, Bulk) and multiplying by Percentage of Transfers.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Weighted Transfer Costs

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows the value of either the total FBA or FBM storage cost (depending on the item FBA flag)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows the value of either the total FBA or FBM storage cost (depending on the item FBA flag)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total Storage Cost

customrecordcustomfield.description: The cubic volume in inches of an item for FBA Storage. Calculated as the actuals in (L * W * H) / (12 * 12 * 12) or (L*W*H) / (1728)
customrecordcustomfield.help: The cubic volume in inches of an item for FBA Storage. Calculated as the actuals in (L * W * H) / (12 * 12 * 12) or (L*W*H) / (1728)
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Cubic Feet

customrecordcustomfield.description: The top-level Amazon Size Tier classification (Standard Size vs. Oversize). This is calculated by shipping rules, but is pulled from item record, because we use that field to determine shipping templates.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The top-level Amazon Size Tier classification (Standard Size vs. Oversize). This is calculated by shipping rules, but is pulled from item record, because we use that field to determine shipping templates.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Amazon Size Tier

customrecordcustomfield.description: The calculated storage cost for <TBD> months based on the item size tier and the cost per item in cubic inches per Amazon rates (stored on Cost Default Record)
customrecordcustomfield.help: The calculated storage cost for <TBD> months based on the item size tier and the cost per item in cubic inches per Amazon rates (stored on Cost Default Record)
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Storage Cost

customrecordcustomfield.description: Sum of FBA and FBM Fulfillment Fees for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Sum of FBA and FBM Fulfillment Fees for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total Fulfillment Cost

customrecordcustomfield.description: Sum of FBM Fulfillment(Picking) Fees for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Sum of FBM Fulfillment(Picking) Fees for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total FBM Fulfillment Fees

customrecordcustomfield.description: Sum of Amazon FBA Fulfillment Fees for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Sum of Amazon FBA Fulfillment Fees for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total FBA Fulfillment Fees

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated with Amazon Default modifier (from default record).
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated with Amazon Default modifier (from default record).
customrecordcustomfield.label: Amazon Dimensional Weight

customrecordcustomfield.description: Determined by lookup of item dimensions and matching to Amazon Size Tier Rate Record
customrecordcustomfield.help: Determined by lookup of item dimensions and matching to Amazon Size Tier Rate Record
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Fulfillment Rate Record

customrecordcustomfield.description: Imported from FBA Size Tier Record
customrecordcustomfield.help: Imported from FBA Size Tier Record
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Base Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description: Imported from FBA Size Tier Record & Multiplied by lbs over threshold.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Imported from FBA Size Tier Record & Multiplied by lbs over threshold.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Additional Fees per Pound

customrecordcustomfield.description: Surcharge on all FBA shipments. Imported from Default Values record.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Surcharge on all FBA shipments. Imported from Default Values record.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Fuel Surcharge %

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated by multiplying all applicable fees with the current Amazon Fuel Surcharge %
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated by multiplying all applicable fees with the current Amazon Fuel Surcharge %
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Fuel Surcharge Amount

customrecordcustomfield.description: Total delivered fees including the Fuel Surcharge Percent Cost
customrecordcustomfield.help: Total delivered fees including the Fuel Surcharge Percent Cost
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Total Delivered Cost

customrecordcustomfield.description: The total FBM Delivered cost for this item before the Fuel Surcharge is applied.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The total FBM Delivered cost for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Total Delivered Fees

customrecordcustomfield.description: Imported base fee for this item's dimensional weight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Imported base fee for this item's dimensional weight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Base Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description: Imported residential surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Imported residential surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Residential Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description: Default percentage fuel surcharge. Improted from Default Costs Record
customrecordcustomfield.help: Default percentage fuel surcharge. Improted from Default Costs Record
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Fuel Surcharge %

customrecordcustomfield.description: Sum of Standard and Residential Peak Surcharges from item costing default record.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Sum of Standard and Residential Peak Surcharges from item costing default record.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Total Peak Surcharge

customrecordcustomfield.description: Imported delivery area surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Imported delivery area surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Delivery Area Surcharge

customrecordcustomfield.description: Imported remote area delivery surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Imported remote area delivery surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Remote Delivery Area Surcharge

customrecordcustomfield.description: Imported "other" surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Imported "other" surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Other Surcharges

customrecordcustomfield.description: Additional Handling Fee, if triggered by any of the additional handling measurements provided.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Additional Handling Fee, if triggered by any of the additional handling measurements provided.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Additional Handling Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description: Large Package Fee, if triggered by any of the additional handling measurements provided.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Large Package Fee, if triggered by any of the additional handling measurements provided.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Large Package Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Weight is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Weight is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Additional Handling: Weight

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Additional Handling: Length + Girth

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Additional Handling: Length

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Width is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Width is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Additional Handling: Width

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, the number of units under one label is greater than 1, and assumed to be a banded/strapped item which triggers the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, the number of units under one label is greater than 1, and assumed to be a banded/strapped item which triggers the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Additional Handling: Packaging

customrecordcustomfield.description: If the Additional Handling Fee applies, this is added.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If the Additional Handling Fee applies, this is added.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Peak Surcharge Fee: Add'l Handling

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Residential Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Residential Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Large Package: Residential Length + Girth

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length is over the Residential Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length is over the Residential Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Large Package: Residential Length

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Commercial Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Commercial Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Large Package: Commercial Length + Girth

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length is over the Commercial Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length is over the Commercial Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Large Package: Commercial Length

customrecordcustomfield.description: If the Large Package Fee applies, this is added.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If the Large Package Fee applies, this is added.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Peak Surcharge : Large Package

customrecordcustomfield.description: Over Maximum Limit Fee, if triggered by any of the over maximum measurements provided.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Over Maximum Limit Fee, if triggered by any of the over maximum measurements provided.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Over Max Limit Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Weight is over the Over Maximum Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Weight is over the Over Maximum Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Over Maximum: Weight

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Over Maximum Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Over Maximum Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Over Maximum: Length/Girth

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length is over the Over Maximum Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length is over the Over Maximum Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Over Maximum: Length

customrecordcustomfield.description: Link to applicable sold cost record for this item sales type (FBM/Retail, FBA, Bulk, etc.)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Link to applicable sold cost record for this item sales type (FBM/Retail, FBA, Bulk, etc.)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Sold Costs

customrecordcustomfield.description: Percent per item of sales cost (from custom record) including sales commission, processing fees, and return allowance.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Percent per item of sales cost (from custom record) including sales commission, processing fees, and return allowance.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Sold Cost %

customrecordcustomfield.description: Per Unit item sales costs (from custom record) including sales commission, processing fees, and return allowance.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Per Unit item sales costs (from custom record) including sales commission, processing fees, and return allowance.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Sold Cost per Unit Fees

customrecordcustomfield.description: Total sold cost for this item (commissions, processing, return allowance).
customrecordcustomfield.help: Total sold cost for this item (commissions, processing, return allowance).
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total Sold Costs
